scripts.commitlint:head: commitlint --from HEAD~1 --to HEAD --verbose
scripts.build:db-packages: bun run --cwd packages/db-core build && bun run --cwd packages/db-adapter-neon build
scripts.typecheck:db-packages: bun run --cwd packages/db-core typecheck && bun run --cwd packages/db-adapter-neon typecheck
scripts.guard:shared-boundaries: rg -n "@/lib/core/config/server|app/src/lib/core/config/server" packages && (echo "Shared packages must not import app server config" && exit 1) || true
